maqras.text: 43|24|Kare (shito) ga,`nanto, sosen ga shitagatte ita anata gata no shiru mono yori mo, yoi michibiki o motarashite mo ka.' To iu to kare-ra wa,`anata ga todoketa mono wa, watashi-tachi wa shinjimasen.' To itta
43|25|sorede ware wa, kare-ra ni hofuku shita. Miyo, shinko o kyohi shita mono no saigo ga dodeatta ka o.
43|26|Iburahimu ga, sono chichi to sono hitobito ni ko itta toki no koto o omoiokose. `Hontoni watashi wa, anata gataga suhai suru mono to zetsuen shimasu.
43|27|Watashi o o tsukuri ni nari, watashi o kanarazu onmichibiki kudasa reru kata ni dake (tsukaemasu.)'
43|28|Kare wa sore o, shison e no eien no kotoba to shite nokoshita. Kanarazu kare-ra wa (omoni) kaeru kotoba to (omotte).
43|29|Iya, ware wa, shinri ga kare-ra no tokoro ni kite, shito ga (jibutsu o) meiryo ni suru made, korera no mono ya, sono sosen no mono o, kyoraku sa seta.
43|30|Daga, shinri ga kare-ra no tokoro ni kita to naru to,`koreha majutsudesu. Watashi-tachi wa, kesshite kore o shinjimasen.' To iu.
43|31|Mata kare-ra wa,`kono kuruan wa, naze 2tsu no machi no yuryokuna jinbutsu ni kudasa renakatta nodeshou ka.' To iu.

43|32|Kare-ra wa omo no jihi o wariateru no ka. Ware wa, gense no kurashi ni hitsuyonamono o, anata gata ni haibun shi, mata aru mono o soto no mono yori ue ni chii o age, aru mono o soto ni fukusa seru. Anata no omo no jihi wa, kare-ra ga chikuseki shita mono yori, haruka ni totoi nodearu.
43|33|Ningen ga (subete fushinjin'na) ichidan to naru osore ga nakereba, ware wa jihibukaki okata o shinjinai mono no tame ni, sono-ka ni wa gin no yane, sore ni noboru no ni (gin no) kaidan o moke,
43|34|sono-ka ni wa (gin no) tobira, mata kare-ra o (gin no) nedoko ni yorikakara seyou.

43|35|Mata kin no soshoku mo (hodokoshitadearou). Shikashi korera no subete wa, gense no seikatsu no kyoraku ni suginai. Anata no omo no omoto no raise koso ga,-nushi o osoreru mono no tame no monodearu.
43|36|Jihibukaki okata no kunkai ni me o tsumuru mono ni wa, ware wa shaitan o furi ateru. Sore wa, kare ni tori hanare gatai tomo to narou.
43|37|Koshite (akuma wa tadashi) michi kara kare-ra o kobamu, shikamo kare-ra wa, jibun wa (tadashiku) michibika rete iru mono to omoikonde iru.
43|38|Ware no moto ni yattekuru toki ni natte, kare wa,`watashi to anata (akuma) no ma ni, azuma to nishi no hedatari ga attanaraba.' To iu. A nanto warui tomo (o motta koto) yo.
43|39|Anata gata wa aku o okonatte ita nodakara, kyo to natte wa nani o itte mo yakudatanai. Anata gata wa mina chobatsu o ukeru.
43|40|Anata wa mimi o katamukenai mono ni kika seru koto ga dekiyou ka. Mata mewosorasu-sha ya, akiraka ni mayoi ya ayamachi no naka ni iru mono o, michibiku koto ga dekiyou ka.
43|41|Sore de tatoe anata o meshiagete mo, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra ni hofuku suru.
43|42|Mata kare-ra ni yakusoku shita koto o, anata ni miseru koto mo dekiru. Ware ga kare-ra o seiatsu suru nado itomo tayasui.
43|43|Sorede anata ni keiji shita mono o, shikkari to mamore. Hontoni anata wa, tadashi michi o tadotte iru.
43|44|Kore wa anata ni tottemo, mata anata no hitobito ni tottemo, tadashiku kunkaidearu. Yagate anata gata wa,(sekimu ni tsuki) towa reru nodearu.
43|45|Anata izen ni ware ga tsukawashita, shito-tachi ni toi nasai. Ware wa, jihibukaki okata igai ni tsukaerubeki kamigami o oita no ka.
43|46|Hontoni ware wa, musa ni samazamana shirushi o mota sete, firuaun to sono choro-tachi ni noko wa shita. Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni ban'yu no omo no shitodesu.'
43|47|Tokoroga, waga shuju no shirushi o gen wa shita no ni, miyo. Kare-ra wa sore o azakeri waratta.

43|48|Sorede ware ga tsugitsugini kare-ra ni shimeshita shirushi wa, dore mo sono nakama no mono yori, idaina monodeatta. Soshite chobatsu o motte kare-ra o korashimeta. Kanarazu kare-ra wa (ware no moto ni) kaerudearou (koto o omotte).
43|49|Sonotoki kare-ra wa itta. `Majutsu-shi yo,-nushi ga anata to musuba reta yakusoku ni yotte, watashi-tachi no tame ni inotte kudasai. Watashi-tachi wa hontoni michibiki o ukeirerudeshou.'
43|50|Daga, ware ga kare-ra kara chobatsu o torinozoku to, dojini kare-ra wa sono yakusoku o yabutte shimatta.

43|51|Soshite firuaun wa sono min ni senkoku shite itta. `Waga min yo, Ejiputo kokudo, soshite korera ashimoto o nagareru kawa wa, watashi no monode wa nai nodesu ka. Anata gata wa (son'na koto ga) wakaranai nodesu ka.
43|52|Watashi wa, kono iyashi, meiryo ni ii arawasu koto mo dekinai mono yori mo, sugurete iru nodesu.
43|53|Naze kogane no ude wa ga kare ni sadzuke rarenai nodesu ka. Mata naze tenshi-tachi ga, tsukisoi tte kare to issho ni tsukawasa renai nodesu ka.'
43|54|Kono yo ni kare wa sono min o sendo shi,-min wa kare ni shitagatta. Hontoni kare-ra wa, arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta.
43|55|Koshite kare-ra wa ware o okora setanode, ware wa kare-ra ni hofuku shi, subete o obore sase,
43|56|kare-ra o kako (no min) to shi, kosei no mono no tame ni (imashime no) rei to shita.
